readable.title: 3576536763_3c8c4f232e
readable.content: A girl dressed in a pink sweatshirt and pink and white striped skirt plays in the waves at the beach . A girl dressed in pink and white runs along the beach . A girl dressed in pink runs from the ocean to the beach . A girl in pink runs away from a wave coming onto the shore . A girl is walking next to the small waves that crash in the ocean .
